content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Russian Hill to Presidio: 14.
Russian Hill to Chinatown: 9.
Russian Hill to Pacific Heights: 7.
Russian Hill to Richmond District: 14.
Russian Hill to Fisherman's Wharf: 7.
Russian Hill to Golden Gate Park: 21.
Russian Hill to Bayview: 23.
Presidio to Russian Hill: 14.
Presidio to Chinatown: 21.
Presidio to Pacific Heights: 11.
Presidio to Richmond District: 7.
Presidio to Fisherman's Wharf: 19.
Presidio to Golden Gate Park: 12.
Presidio to Bayview: 31.
Chinatown to Russian Hill: 7.
Chinatown to Presidio: 19.
Chinatown to Pacific Heights: 10.
Chinatown to Richmond District: 20.
Chinatown to Fisherman's Wharf: 8.
Chinatown to Golden Gate Park: 23.
Chinatown to Bayview: 22.
Pacific Heights to Russian Hill: 7.
Pacific Heights to Presidio: 11.
Pacific Heights to Chinatown: 11.
Pacific Heights to Richmond District: 12.
Pacific Heights to Fisherman's Wharf: 13.
Pacific Heights to Golden Gate Park: 15.
Pacific Heights to Bayview: 22.
Richmond District to Russian Hill: 13.
Richmond District to Presidio: 7.
Richmond District to Chinatown: 20.
Richmond District to Pacific Heights: 10.
Richmond District to Fisherman's Wharf: 18.
Richmond District to Golden Gate Park: 9.
Richmond District to Bayview: 26.
Fisherman's Wharf to Russian Hill: 7.
Fisherman's Wharf to Presidio: 17.
Fisherman's Wharf to Chinatown: 12.
Fisherman's Wharf to Pacific Heights: 12.
Fisherman's Wharf to Richmond District: 18.
Fisherman's Wharf to Golden Gate Park: 25.
Fisherman's Wharf to Bayview: 26.
Golden Gate Park to Russian Hill: 19.
Golden Gate Park to Presidio: 11.
Golden Gate Park to Chinatown: 23.
Golden Gate Park to Pacific Heights: 16.
Golden Gate Park to Richmond District: 7.
Golden Gate Park to Fisherman's Wharf: 24.
Golden Gate Park to Bayview: 23.
Bayview to Russian Hill: 23.
Bayview to Presidio: 31.
Bayview to Chinatown: 18.
Bayview to Pacific Heights: 23.
Bayview to Richmond District: 25.
Bayview to Fisherman's Wharf: 25.
Bayview to Golden Gate Park: 22.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Russian Hill at 9:00AM. Matthew will be at Presidio from 11:00AM to 9:00PM. You'd like to meet Matthew for a minimum of 90 minutes. Margaret will be at Chinatown from 9:15AM to 6:45PM. You'd like to meet Margaret for a minimum of 90 minutes. Nancy will be at Pacific Heights from 2:15PM to 5:00PM. You'd like to meet Nancy for a minimum of 15 minutes. Helen will be at Richmond District from 7:45PM to 10:00PM. You'd like to meet Helen for a minimum of 60 minutes. Rebecca will be at Fisherman's Wharf from 9:15PM to 10:15PM. You'd like to meet Rebecca for a minimum of 60 minutes. Kimberly will be at Golden Gate Park from 1:00PM to 4:30PM. You'd like to meet Kimberly for a minimum of 120 minutes. Kenneth will be at Bayview from 2:30PM to 6:00PM. You'd like to meet Kenneth for a minimum of 60 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.
